500 X 1 = 500 
500 X 2 = 1000 
500 X 3 = 1500 
500 X 4 = 2000 
500 X 5 = 2500 
500 X 6 = 3000 
500 X 7 = 3500 
500 X 8 = 4000 
500 X 9 = 4500 
500 X 10 = 5000 
--------------------
200 X 1 = 200 
200 X 2 = 400 
200 X 3 = 600 
200 X 4 = 800 
200 X 5 = 1000 
200 X 6 = 1200 
200 X 7 = 1400 
200 X 8 = 1600 
200 X 9 = 1800 
200 X 10 = 2000 
--------------------
3000 X 1 = 3000 
3000 X 2 = 6000 
3000 X 3 = 9000 
3000 X 4 = 12000 
3000 X 5 = 15000 
3000 X 6 = 18000 
3000 X 7 = 21000 
3000 X 8 = 24000 
3000 X 9 = 27000 
3000 X 10 = 30000
